title: TodoList
description: This is a To-Do List application built to learn and apply the latest web technologies. It helps users efficiently manage tasks with a clean, interactive, and user-friendly interface.

title: Multiplication Game
description: This is a Multiplication Game created to learn and apply the latest web technologies. It offers an interactive and engaging way to practice multiplication while exploring modern development techniques.

title: Conversion Calculator
description: This is a Conversion Calculator designed to learn and apply the latest web technologies. It provides accurate and user-friendly unit conversions with a modern interface.

title: Gadget Store
description: This is a Gadget Site built to explore and implement the latest web technologies. It showcases modern design, responsiveness, and interactive features to enhance user experience.

title: Form Validation
description: This is a Form Validation project built to explore and implement modern web technologies. It showcases real-time input validation using the latest languages and best practices to enhance user experience and data accuracy.

title: Information Form
description: This is an Information Form project created to learn and apply the latest web technologies. It features real-time validation and a user-friendly interface to ensure accurate data entry and a smooth user experience.
